title: Where's My Shop?
body: Topic for a specific discussion. Right now for Teemoween, we have access to our personal shop thing (which I always love the look of). I can't find it on the new client to even know where it might go - let alone work. So if i want to check my personalized sales, I need to use the legacy one. Am i just missing it? and if not, why would it not be there during the store event?

replies.body: You need to use the legacy client, it is not available in the alpha, sorry for the let down :(
Yeah i looked everywhere for it. Thought it was just me.

I could not find it either. Not in loot or store. I just went into legacy to check it out. Other things to go into legacy for: DoomBots. We are currently unable to accept invites for Doombots games, my guess would be that it is all RGM games.
